outputs.output_descr: The project aims to contribute to strengthening of  national capacity for policy implementation through the review and development of policies and strategies for environment and natural resource and climate risk management ; review and updating  of the national environment management policy, review of EIA regulations and guidelines to mainstream health and social issues (HIV) into capital projects, development of a national biomass strategy, preparing a strategy for electronic waste management and strengthening the institutional coordination for climate risk management activities.

project_descr: Improving policies and strategies for sustainable environment, natural resources and climate risk management
project_title: Improving policies and strategies for environment
